design_principles: Fusion: Logistics Precision + Swiss Grid Clarity
Zoom In: Critical alerts (>39h) must pop instantly
Negative Space: Dense data needs breathing room in headers/footers
Contrast: High contrast for readability in sunlight or low light

usage_rules.headings: Use Manrope for all page titles and modal headers. Weight: 600 or 700.
usage_rules.data_grid: Use Inter with 'tnum' (tabular nums) feature setting for all time and hours data.
usage_rules.alerts: Use Manrope Bold for alert badges.

semantic_mapping.overtime_alert: bg-red-100 text-red-700 border-red-200 dark:bg-red-900/30 dark:text-red-300 dark:border-red-800
semantic_mapping.undertime_alert: bg-amber-100 text-amber-700 border-amber-200 dark:bg-amber-900/30 dark:text-amber-300 dark:border-amber-800
semantic_mapping.school_block: Use distinct pastel colors with dark text for light mode, and saturated colors with white text for dark mode.

dashboard_grid.rules: Use 'Control Room' density. Summary cards span 2-3 cols. Main chart spans 6-8 cols.

scheduler_grid.interaction: Horizontal scroll for time, Vertical scroll for drivers. Sync scroll positions.

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use 'backdrop-blur-md bg-white/80 dark:bg-black/80' for sticky headers to maintain context while scrolling.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Use 'shadow-sm' for grid items, 'shadow-lg' for dragged items (lift effect).
visual_enhancers.borders: Use subtle 1px borders. Avoid heavy grid lines. Let whitespace define rows.

assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for all UI icons. Use 'Bus', 'Calendar', 'Users', 'AlertTriangle', 'Clock' icons.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text on colored blocks (schools) meets WCAG AA (4.5:1). Use dark text on pastel blocks, white text on dark blocks.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus ring with color #4CAF50 on all interactive elements.
accessibility.reduced_motion: Disable drag animations if prefers-reduced-motion is true.

instructions_to_main_agent.general: You are building a high-density data application. Performance and clarity are paramount. Do not over-animate the grid.
instructions_to_main_agent.grid_implementation: Use CSS Grid or Flexbox for the scheduler. Avoid HTML tables if possible for better drag-and-drop control, or use a specialized library if needed (but prefer custom CSS Grid for full control).
instructions_to_main_agent.state_management: The scheduler state is complex. Ensure updates to 'hours worked' are instant and reflected in the alert badges immediately.
instructions_to_main_agent.theme: Implement a 'ThemeProvider' wrapping the app. Default to 'light'. Persist preference in localStorage.
instructions_to_main_agent.testing: Add 'data-testid' to every cell, driver row, and action button. Format: 'driver-row-{id}', 'time-block-{id}'.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
